snippet.title: Monster Hero: Adventures | Game Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
About
Monster Hero is an adventure RPG uncovering companion gameplay with unorthodox puzzles, quirky boss fights, and a heart-felt story between humans and monsters.

Dive deep into a tale where dark forces loom and the bond between a young boy and his flying cat, Noah, becomes the beacon of hope in mending the rift between humans and monsters.

Add to wish list now! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2582750/Monster_Hero/

For more content, Join our Discord!
https://discord.gg/zbWndTBk

Want to test the game? 
https://forms.gle/T1b4ACi3vrfJaHsY8

Website
https://tinnystudios.com

Credits
Music: Trouble Is Brewing - By David Fesliyan

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/trouble-is-brewing/296
